sections.heading: Final decree at first hearingNotwithstanding Article 1238, upon due consideration of the factors enumerated in Article 1230(B), the court may render a final decree of private adoption at the first hearing, without the necessity of first entering an interlocutory decree, only if the rights of the chi
sections.text: Final decree at first hearingNotwithstanding Article 1238, upon due consideration of the factors enumerated in Article 1230(B), the court may render a final decree of private adoption at the first hearing, without the necessity of first entering an interlocutory decree, only if the rights of the child's parents have been terminated pursuant to Title X or XI of this Code and the child has lived in the petitioner's home for six months.Acts 1991, No. 235, ยง12, eff. Jan. 1, 1992; Acts 1993, No. 634, ยง1, eff. June 15, 1993; Acts 1999, No. 1062, ยง4, eff. Jan. 1, 2000; Acts 2021, No. 6, ยง1.
